forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West wind 8 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West wind 6 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco tonight, the atmospheric calm is punctuated by a crisp clarity, promising residents a pleasant evening experience. The skies are mostly clear, allowing the deep indigo of twilight to envelop the city, a perfect backdrop against which the last glimmers of sunlight fade. A westerly breeze dances gently, rustling the leaves and carrying the refreshing scents of the bay. With temperatures settling near 51 degrees, a light jacket or perhaps a cozy sweater would provide the ideal comfort as the evening unfolds, especially if you find yourself sipping a warm drink on a sidewalk patio.

Looking ahead to Tuesday, the promise of sunshine beckons, with temperatures rising to a gentle near 66. Throughout the day, you may notice the brisk west wind picking up, a harbinger of the notorious Pacific chill that makes layering an art here. As the sun reaches its zenith, afternoon temperatures may dip slightly, so dressing in flexible layers may be best to adapt to the day's changing moods. This weather invites exploration—a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps an afternoon spent meandering through Golden Gate Park, savoring the tranquility of blooming gardens. Whether you choose to linger in a café or soak in the warmth of a sunny spot, tomorrow's ambiance holds an allure worth embracing.
